PHRASE.LANG: This bundle is the perfect collection of dances for all K-pop lovers! It contains the Cowboy Dance Moves pack: horse-riding, side-skipping, lasso waving, mexican wave, and the Arrogance Moves pack: swaying hips with your arms folded, skipping with your hands waving, thrusting while snapping your fingers, rocking with your chin on your fist, and a randomizer. [#Legal]

Ce bundle contient le pack des Danses de Cowboy: le cavalier, le lasso, les pas chassés et la ola, et le pack des mouvements de danse "Arrogance": balancement des hanches les bras croisés, sautillement en agitant les mains, coups de reins avec claquement des doigts, ondulation avec le menton en appui sur le poing, et un mode aléatoire.[#Legal]
Dieser Bundle enthält die Cowboy Tänzen und die "Arrogance" Tanzen. [#Legal]
Contiene il ballo da cowboy e le mosse "Arrogance". [#Legal]
Contiene el baile de los vaqueros, y los movimientos "Arrogance". [#Legal]

This bundle is the perfect collection of dances for all K-pop lovers! It contains the Cowboy Dance Moves pack: horse-riding, side-skipping, lasso waving, mexican wave, and the Arrogance Moves pack: swaying hips with your arms folded, skipping with your hands waving, thrusting while snapping your fingers, rocking with your chin on your fist, and a randomizer. [#Legal]
